rewards.description:
Enter the world of Metin2, the oriental action MMORPG! Raise your weapons and fight together with millions of active players worldwide!

This year, Metin2 turns 18 – celebrate this major anniversary with us and enjoy drop and EXP boosts, special sales and much more!

Join Metin2’s Twitch community and be rewarded with Twitch drops including special anniversary items, the Personal Premium Shop and other useful treasures!

- Watch 2 hours to earn: 65 Random Boosters
- Watch 4 hours to earn: 250 Credits
- Watch 6 hours to earn: Premium Mystery Variant

rewards.description: With the arrival of the 4th class, the Tinkerer, Hellcard 1.0 releases from Early Access. To celebrate we have added new Tinkerer skin and emotes that can be unlocked via Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Hellcard Drops

rewards.description:
There’s nothing a pirate on the Sea of Thieves likes more than free loot – and with Twitch Drops, you can claim some just by linking your Twitch account to your Sea of Thieves account and tuning in to our special events!        

Twitch Drops are free items awarded to players for watching participating streamers during promotional activities. Sign up now to be eligible for the latest Twitch Drops event!
rewards.name: S14: Twitch Drops Fest

rewards.description: Earn a Grim Harvester Costume and Sungold Bay Thoroughbred Mount simply by watching Drop-enabled ESO streams on Twitch!
rewards.name: Twitch Drops Fest

rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online - January 2

rewards.description: Earning this reward is simple. You only need to link your IOI Account to your Twitch account and then watch a cumulative 1 hour of HITMAN World of Assassination on Twitch during the drop campaign duration.
rewards.name: Season of the Luck

rewards.description: Watch Civ Streams from the Firaxis Twitch channel to earn rewards!  Watch for 15 mins and claim the reward: Exploration Age Banner.

rewards.description:
To celebrate the launch of Dimworld Eco RP's new roleplay season, we’re introducing a brand-new marketplace item: the Norse Steel Axe Blueprint!

For a limited time, you can claim this unique blueprint for free through an exclusive Twitch Drop. As a blueprint, you’ll need to gather resources and craft it yourself in-game, so don’t miss your chance to snag it before it’s gone!
rewards.name: Norse Steel Axe Blueprint

rewards.description: Celebrate the return of the this battle-royale-inspired event. Keg Leg returns to pillage the Arathi Highlands. Join the crew, fight to be the last pirate standing, and grab a new item!  Watch 4 hours between January 14 and February 4 to get The Coward's Azure Target Transmog.
rewards.name: The Coward's Azure Target

rewards.description: Starting in Split 1, Riot Games is introducing Twitch Subscriptions to select LoL Esports broadcast channels! This new initiative offers fans an enhanced viewing experience while providing direct support to their favorite leagues and teams. Subscribers with paid and gifted Tier 1 subscriptions will unlock exclusive in-game rewards through Twitch’s Drop Fest. Subscribers can earn the special “Why Though?” emote by subscribing to participating channels.
rewards.name: Subs Launch - Drop Fest 1

rewards.description: Honkai: Star Rail Drops Campaign
rewards.name: V3.0 Honkai: Star Rail

rewards.description: Once Human Spring Festival Drops event will start from January 16, 2025 to February 11, 2025 (PT).  Connect your Once Human character and Twitch account to receive the reward. Watch a participating stream channel to join the activity. You need to watch Once Human for 4 hours and gift one sub to the streamer to claim all the rewards. The rewards will be sent to your account in 24 hours.
rewards.name: Spring Festival Drops
